subject: Add OneSignal integration for web push notifications
body:
Migrates web mobile and web desktop notifications from custom service
worker implementation to OneSignal for improved reliability, analytics,
and easier management.

Changes:
- Add OneSignal SDK integration (services/onesignal.ts)
- Add app instance management service (services/appInstance.ts)
- Update notification hook to use OneSignal for web platforms
- Initialize OneSignal in app layout with click handlers
- Add database migration for onesignal_player_id column
- Create Supabase Edge Function for sending notifications via OneSignal API
- Update CLAUDE.md documentation with OneSignal setup details

Benefits:
- Free tier with unlimited notifications
- Better delivery rates and reliability
- Analytics dashboard for monitoring
- Unified API for web mobile and desktop
- Professional notification infrastructure

Implementation:
- Native mobile continues using expo-notifications
- Web platforms now use OneSignal for push notifications
- Player IDs stored in database for targeted notifications
- Backend sends notifications via OneSignal REST API
title: Add OneSignal integration for web push notifications
